description: “You know, I have a lot of skills, but predicting Donald Trump is not one of them.” — Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, asked on Sunday at a Koch brothers’ conference in California how he expects Donald Trump will fare in the first Republican primary debate on Thursday.
title: The New York Times
title_page: Verbatim: Ted Cruz's Crystal Ball Reveals No Insight on Donald Trump - First Draft. Political News, Now. - The New York Times
text:
You know, I have a lot of skills, but predicting Donald Trump is not one of them.”
— Senator Ted Cruz of Texas, asked on Sunday at a Koch brothers’ conference in Dana Point, Calif., how he expects Donald Trump will fare in the first Republican primary debate on Thursday.
